Quick search

archetypebuildings¶

Currently we implemented two methodologies to create archetype buildings:

  • bmvbs
    • Office module
    • SingleFamilyDwelling module
    • Institute module
    • Institute4 module
    • Institute8 module
    • Literature
  • urbanrenet

All new archetype buildings should inherit from either residential or nonresidential buildings:

residential¶

class teaser.logic.archetypebuildings.residential.Residential(parent=None, name=None, year_of_construction=None, net_leased_area=None, with_ahu=False)¶

Bases: teaser.logic.buildingobjects.building.Building

Root Class for each type building.

Class as parent of specific type buildings. Subclass from Building to represent Type Buildings. Superclass for every type building.

Attributes

Methods

generate_archetype()¶

Generates an archetype building.

Define your type of archetype generation.

Bases: teaser.logic.buildingobjects.building.Building

Root Class for each type building.

Class as parent of specific type buildings. Subclass from Building to represent Type Buildings. Superclass for every type building.

Attributes

Methods

generate_archetype()¶

Generates an archetype building.

Define your type of arechtype generation.
